## DropErc721ClaimConditions.set() method

Sets public mint conditions for the next minting using the claim condition factory.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(claimConditionInputs: ClaimConditionInput[], resetClaimEligibilityForAll?: boolean): TransactionResultPromise;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  claimConditionInputs | ClaimConditionInput\[\] |  |
|  resetClaimEligibilityForAll | boolean | Whether to reset the state of who already claimed NFTs previously |

<b>Returns:</b>

TransactionResultPromise
